Text:
there's something wrong with this torrent, files are corrupted or something. ableton wont recognize them, it just shows them as 3 minutes of nothing, windows media player won't open them (i have flac codecs installed for WMP), AVS won't recognize them so i can't convert them to mp3...

i would brush it off as just a fucked up torrent if it wasn't for one thing, they play fine in VLC media player... perfect quality, just no way of using or converting them, lol. very strange.
